Properties

Location

Gets or sets the location of the sub-pad within its parent pad.

Point Location { get; set; }

Property Value

Point

Remarks

This operation is not thread safe.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The value is outside the parent's bounds.

ObjectDisposedException

Sub-pad is no longer usable.

CursesSynchronizationException

Thrown if this operation was expected to run on the main thread/context but wasn't.

Pad

The parent pad of this sub-pad.

IPad Pad { get; }

Property Value

IPad

Remarks

This operation is not thread safe.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

The value is outside the bounds.

ObjectDisposedException

Sub-pad is no longer usable.

CursesSynchronizationException

Thrown if this operation was expected to run on the main thread/context but wasn't.
